aiInterview.title: AI Resume Builder Interview
aiInterview.subtitle: Answer a few questions and let our AI create your perfect resume
aiInterview.question: Question
aiInterview.thankYou: Thank you for completing the interview. We have collected all the information needed to generate your resume.
aiInterview.resumeGenerated: Your resume has been successfully generated. You can now proceed to the editor to make any final adjustments.

aiPrompts.summaryPrompt: Create a professional summary for a {{position}} in the {{industry}} industry with {{experience}} years of experience.
aiPrompts.experiencePrompt: Enhance this work experience for my {{position}} role at {{company}}.
aiPrompts.skillsPrompt: Suggest relevant skills for a {{position}} in the {{industry}} industry.

questions.careerPosition: What job title are you targeting?
questions.careerIndustry: What industry do you work in?
questions.careerExperience: How many years of experience do you have?
questions.recentJob: Tell me about your most recent job (company, position, duration)
questions.achievements: What are 2-3 key achievements from this role?
questions.previousJob: Tell me about your previous job (optional)
questions.previousAchievements: What were your key achievements there? (optional)
questions.highestEducation: What is your highest level of education?
questions.fieldOfStudy: What was your field of study?
questions.softSkills: What soft skills do you possess?
questions.certifications: Do you have any relevant certifications? (optional)
questions.strengths: What are your biggest professional strengths?
questions.uniqueValue: What unique value do you bring to employers?

aiServices.errorGenerating: Error generating content. Please try again.
aiServices.errorParsing: The AI returned an invalid response format. Please try again.
aiServices.apiError: API key is invalid. Please check your API key.
aiServices.rateLimitError: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again in a few moments.
aiServices.serviceError: Service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
aiServices.networkError: Network error. Please check your internet connection.

dashboard.manageResumes: Manage your resumes and create new ones from templates
dashboard.manageCoverLetters: Manage your cover letters and create new ones from templates
dashboard.noResumesYet: You haven't created any resumes yet
dashboard.noCoverLettersYet: You haven't created any cover letters yet
dashboard.getStartedResume: Get started by creating your first resume from one of our professional templates
dashboard.getStartedCoverLetter: Get started by creating your first cover letter from one of our professional templates
dashboard.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view your dashboard
dashboard.shareLinkInfo: Share this link with others to allow them to view your resume. The link will be valid for 30 days.
dashboard.shareCoverLetterLinkInfo: Share this link with others to allow them to view your cover letter. The link will be valid for 30 days.

coverLetters.title: Cover Letter Templates
coverLetters.subtitle: Choose from our collection of professional cover letter templates or use our AI assistant to create one
coverLetters.savedToDashboard: Cover letter saved to your dashboard
coverLetters.signInToSave: Please sign in to save your cover letter
coverLetters.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
coverLetters.defaultContent: I am writing to express my interest in [Position] at [Company]...

coverLetterAssistant.title: AI Cover Letter Assistant
coverLetterAssistant.subtitle: Generate a tailored cover letter for your job application using AI
coverLetterAssistant.companyInfoPlaceholder: Add any details about the company that you'd like to highlight
coverLetterAssistant.yourExperiencePlaceholder: Highlight your relevant experience, skills, or paste parts of your resume
coverLetterAssistant.additionalNotesPlaceholder: Any specific points you'd like to include in your cover letter
coverLetterAssistant.generationError: Failed to generate cover letter. Please try again.
coverLetterAssistant.placeholder: Your generated cover letter will appear here
coverLetterAssistant.placeholderSubtitle: Fill in the form and click "Generate Cover Letter" to create a personalized cover letter
